returnValues.name: isSupported
returnValues.description: Indicates if the browser supports the Notification API.

returnValues.name: notifications
returnValues.description: An array of all notifications stored in the global history.

returnValues.name: notify
returnValues.description: Function to trigger a new system notification and save it to the store.

returnValues.name: requestPermission
returnValues.description: Triggers the browser prompt to request notification permissions.
